description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Archfey
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleep00000]{Sleep}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.e3HVFpfUVeG4SmOx]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.frJFZlAXfU5arQj3]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.XlGyjqqQFUNuKCGb]{Plant Growth}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.qqRb2Nywq8rdMp83]{Dominate Beast}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.T7WVjD10HKfI4VfV]{Greater Invisibility}
